thread.title: Cayetano may be needed in Senate than in DFA, says Duterte
thread.title_full: Cayetano may be needed in Senate than in DFA, says Duterte

author: acerojano
title: Cayetano may be needed in Senate than in DFA, says Duterte
text:
Philippine Daily Inquirer / 09:56 PM March 13, 2017 Sen. Alan Peter Cayetano. LYN RILLON/INQUIRER FILE PHOTO 
President Duterte said Sen. Alan Peter Cayetano may be needed in the Senate than in the Department of Foreign Affairs. 
Asked whether he would appoint his defeated running mate Cayetano to the DFA, which is what he had said in previous statements, Mr. Duterte said the two of them had yet to discuss the matter. 
Mr. Duterte also said Cayetano was needed at the Senate. ADVERTISEMENT 
“Senator Cayetano is a very brilliant man. He would be needed by the Senate. Do not lose him. We can just have an acting-acting [DFA secretary],” he said in a press briefing. 
He has appointed Enrique Manalo as acting DFA Secretary after the Commission on Appointments rejected Perfecto Yasay over citizenship questions. 
The Senate recently underwent a reorganization that broke the supermajority. Five Liberal Party Senators critical of the administration were kicked out of the majority.
